name: Occult Basement
description:
You're playing as a janitor who's been ordered to remove possessed furniture from a client's basement. Use the power of a light switch to keep the demons at bay.

Keyboard/mouse controls:

Move with WASD keys, sprint with SHIFT, press E to interact and mouse to look around

Gamepad controls:

Left thumbstick: movement, Right thumbstick: aim, B / O: interact, Right trigger: attack, A / X: jump, Left trigger: sprint

This game was created during the Finnish Game Jam 2022. Link to GGJ site: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/occult-basement-1
